executiveSummary.title: 100 MW Solar PV Power Plant at Pabna, Bangladesh
executiveSummary.location: Bhabanipur and Ratanpur Mouza, Pabna Sadar, Pabna, Bangladesh
executiveSummary.technology: JA Solar Mono PERC P-type bifacial (545 & 550 Wp) modules mounted on fixed tilt Module Mounting Structure (MMS) with 18Â° tilt angle
keyHighlights: PPA signed with BPDB at fixed tariff rate of USD 0.1195/kWh for 20 years
Using JA Solar bifacial modules and Huawei string inverters
21 km double circuit overhead transmission line to Ishurdi Grid Substation
Project developed on approximately 377 acres of land
executiveSummary.summary: M/s Dynamic Sun Energy Private Limited is developing 100 MW solar PV plant using JA Solar Mono PERC P-type bifacial modules mounted on fixed tilt structures. The DC power is converted to AC using Huawei string inverters and evacuated at 132 kV using approximately 21 kms double circuit overhead transmission line.

projectCompany.name: Dynamic Sun Energy Private Limited
projectCompany.description: Joint Venture of Paramount Textile Limited (PTL) and Shapoorji Pallonji Infrastructure Capital Company. PTL has previously developed 30MW plant which is operational.

moduleManufacturer.name: JA Solar
moduleManufacturer.description: Tier 1 global manufacturer with cumulative shipment of 152GW as of Q2-2023. Presence in 135 countries with 32,544 employees.

inverterManufacturer.name: Huawei Technologies
inverterManufacturer.description: Global player with significant share in utility scale solar PV plants. Shipped 52 GW of PV inverters in 2021.

epcContractor.name: Multiple Vendors
epcContractor.description: Project Company has issued POs to different vendors for various activities instead of single EPC agreement.

omContractor.name: Dynamic Sun Energy Private Limited
omContractor.description: Project Company will perform O&M with own team. Paramount group already operating 30MW solar plant.

powerPurchaser.name: Bangladesh Power Development Board (BPDB)
powerPurchaser.description: Government agency functioning as single buyer in Bangladesh power market. Total installed capacity of 20,383 MW as of Jan-2020.

transmissionUtility.name: Power Grid Company of Bangladesh (PGCB)
transmissionUtility.description: Owns and operates power grid in Bangladesh. Subsidiary of BPDB with extensive transmission network.

modules.value: Bifacial Mono PERC, half cell, multi busbar

milestones.name: Equipment Delivery
milestones.description: Delivery of major equipment including modules and inverters

risks.description: Missing delivery schedule in inverter supply agreement
risks.mitigation: Request delivery schedule from Project Company

risks.description: Incomplete lightning protection coverage in PV area
risks.mitigation: Revise lightning protection design and calculations

risks.description: Missing performance bond in inverter and MMS supply agreements
risks.mitigation: Clarify reasons and measures for breach of agreement

risks.description: Land acquisition not fully completed (45 acres pending)
risks.mitigation: Monitor land acquisition progress and update status

permits.description: License for generation and supply of electricity
Approval for construction of transmission line

sensitivity.generation: P99 level from base case P90
